00054 typedef uint64_t ParticleIndex;
00055 
00056 class ParticlesData;
00057 // Particle Collection Interface
00059 
00064 class ParticlesInfo
00065 {
00066 protected:
00067     virtual ~ParticlesInfo() {}
00068 public:
00069     friend void freeCached(ParticlesData* particles);
00070     
00074     virtual void release() const=0;
00075 
00077     virtual int numAttributes() const=0;
00078 
00080     virtual int numParticles() const=0;
00081 
00083     virtual bool attributeInfo(const char* attributeName,ParticleAttribute& attribute) const=0;
00084 
00086     virtual bool attributeInfo(const int attributeInfo,ParticleAttribute& attribute) const=0;
00087 };
00088 
00089 // Particle Data Interface
00091 
00095 class ParticlesData:public ParticlesInfo
00096 {
00097 protected:
00098     virtual ~ParticlesData() {}
00099 public:
00100 
00101     typedef ParticleIterator<true> const_iterator;
00102 
00106     template<class T> inline void data(const ParticleAttribute& attribute,
00107         const int indexCount,const ParticleIndex* particleIndices,const bool sorted,T* values)
00108     {
00109         assert(typeCheck<T>(attribute.type));
00110         dataInternalMultiple(attribute,indexCount,particleIndices,sorted,(char*)values);
00111     }
00112 
00113     template<class T> inline const T* data(const ParticleAttribute& attribute,
00114         const ParticleIndex particleIndex) const
00115     {
00116         // TODO: add type checking
00117         return static_cast<T*>(dataInternal(attribute,particleIndex));
00118     }
00119 
00120 
00125     virtual void dataAsFloat(const ParticleAttribute& attribute,const int indexCount,
00126         const ParticleIndex* particleIndices,const bool sorted,float* values) const=0;
00127 
00131     virtual void findPoints(const float bboxMin[3],const float bboxMax[3],
00132         std::vector<ParticleIndex>& points) const=0;
00133 
00139     virtual float findNPoints(const float center[3],int nPoints,const float maxRadius,
00140         std::vector<ParticleIndex>& points,std::vector<float>& pointDistancesSquared) const=0;
00141 
00145     virtual int findNPoints(const float center[3],int nPoints,const float maxRadius,
00146         ParticleIndex *points, float *pointDistancesSquared, float *finalRadius2) const=0;
00147 
00149     virtual const_iterator setupConstIterator() const=0;
00150 
00152     const_iterator begin() const
00153     {return setupConstIterator();}
00154 
00156     const_iterator end() const
00157     {return const_iterator();}
00158 
00159 private:
00160     virtual void* dataInternal(const ParticleAttribute& attribute,const ParticleIndex particleIndex) const=0;
00161     virtual void dataInternalMultiple(const ParticleAttribute& attribute,const int indexCount,
00162         const ParticleIndex* particleIndices,const bool sorted,char* values) const=0;
00163 };
00164 
00165 // Particle Mutable Data Interface
00167 
00171 class ParticlesDataMutable:public ParticlesData
00172 {
00173 protected:
00174     virtual ~ParticlesDataMutable() {}
00175 
00176 public:
00177 
00178     typedef ParticleIterator<false> iterator;
00179 
00182     template<class T> inline T* dataWrite(const ParticleAttribute& attribute,
00183         const ParticleIndex particleIndex) const
00184     {
00185         // TODO: add type checking
00186         return static_cast<T*>(dataInternal(attribute,particleIndex));
00187     }
00188 
00191     virtual void sort()=0;
00192 
00194     virtual ParticleAttribute addAttribute(const char* attribute,ParticleAttributeType type,
00195         const int count)=0;
00196 
00198     virtual ParticleIndex addParticle()=0;
00199 
00202     virtual iterator addParticles(const int count)=0;
00203 
00205     iterator begin()
00206     {return setupIterator();}
00207 
00209     iterator end()
00210     {return iterator();}
00211 
00213     virtual iterator setupIterator()=0;
00214 
00215 private:
00216     virtual void* dataInternal(const ParticleAttribute& attribute,const ParticleIndex particleIndex) const=0;
00217 };
